description: Lance leader reaction events - dynamic dialogue based on personality and memory

events.title: Meeting the Lance Leader
events.body:
You're brought before {LANCE_LEADER_FULL_NAME}, the leader of your lance.

{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} regards you with a measuring gaze.

"{OPENING_LINE}"

options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} nods. "Good. We'll see what you're made of."
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} raises an eyebrow. "We'll see."
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} seems pleased. "Good attitude. Don't lose it."

events.title: A Word in Private
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} catches you after formation.

"We need to talk. Privately." Their eyes are cold as iron.

"I've heard whispers about your... activities. Quartermaster supplies going missing. Gold changing hands. I don't know the details, and I don't want to."

"But I'm telling you now: in my lance, we follow the code. Always. This is your only warning."

options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} holds your gaze for a long moment. "See that it doesn't."

options.text: [Deny] "I don't know what you're talking about."
options.resultText: "Don't insult me." The words cut like a blade. "I wasn't born yesterday."
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST}'s face hardens. "Then everyone can share your punishment detail."

events.title: A Concerned Talk
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} finds you during the evening meal, sitting down heavily beside you.

"Look, I'm not going to lecture you. You're not a child. But I've been around long enough to know what certain... patterns... look like."

They sigh. "I've seen good soldiers destroy their careers over petty greed. Soldiers with more promise than you. Don't become another one of those stories."

options.text: [Appreciate] "Thank you for the warning. I'll be more careful."
options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} claps you on the shoulder. "That's all I ask."
"I don't need explanations. Just... be smarter about it. Or stop entirely."
Disappointment flickers across their face. "I hope so. For your sake."

events.title: A Professional Discussion
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} intercepts you during duty change.

"I notice things go missing around you. Gold finds its way into your pockets. I don't care—as long as the job gets done and the lord doesn't notice."

"But if this blows back on the lance, you'll answer for it. Not me. Understand?"

options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} nods curtly. "Good. We understand each other."
"See that it doesn't. Now get back to work."

events.title: Rare Acknowledgment
events.body:
After formation, {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} approaches. This is unusual—they rarely seek anyone out.

"What you did yesterday. In the battle." A pause. "That was... acceptable."

From them, this is effusive praise.

options.resultText: The faintest ghost of approval crosses their face. "Keep it up."
They nod once and turn away. High praise indeed.

events.title: Proud Mentor
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} finds you at the fire, a rare smile on their weathered face.

"My old wolf heart nearly stopped when I heard what you did. Bold. Dangerous. But you knew what you were doing."

"That's why you're one of my best. You know when to take risks."

options.resultText: Their smile broadens. "Ha! Flattery. But I'll take it."
"Luck favors the prepared. And you were prepared."

events.title: Discipline Issues
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} summons you. Their expression is serious.

"Your discipline record is becoming a problem. Fighting. Insubordination. Complaints from other lances."

"I've defended you so far, but my patience has limits."

options.text: [Apologize] "I'll do better. I give you my word."
options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} studies you. "Words are cheap. Show me with actions."
"I don't care who started it. I care about who ends up in front of me."
Their eyes harden. "Then you can all share punishment detail."

events.title: A Pattern Noticed
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} pulls you aside after duty.

"I've been watching you. I remember the quartermaster incident. And the supply 'discrepancy.' And the gold that vanished during the last supply run."

"I remember everything, soldier. Don't think I've forgotten."

options.resultText: "Prove it. Actions, not words."
"I don't need to prove it to a magistrate. I just need to know. And I do."

events.title: Earned Trust
events.body:
{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} stops you one evening, their manner less formal than usual.

"You've been with us for a while now. I've watched you. Seen how you handle yourself."

"You've earned my trust. That's not something I give lightly."

options.text: [Honored] "That means a great deal to me, {LANCE_LEADER_RANK}."
options.resultText: A rare smile. "Just keep being who you are."
"I know you won't. That's why I'm telling you this."

events.title: A Familiar Face

options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} nods slowly. "The road always calls us back."
"Fair enough. At least you're honest about it."
"We always need good soldiers. Question is, are you still one?"

events.title: New Leadership
events.body:
The lance has gathered. A new face stands before you—{LANCE_LEADER_FULL_NAME}.

{LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} surveys the assembled soldiers.

"{NEW_LEADER_INTRO}"

"Any questions, ask them now. Otherwise, we have work to do."

options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} returns the salute crisply. "Good. Discipline."

options.text: [Observe] Watch and take measure of the new leader.
options.resultText: {LANCE_LEADER_FIRST} notices your measuring gaze and returns it. Time will tell.
